mapper.sql: id, uuid, add_time, add_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, user_type, status, user_name, password, salt, nick_name, avator, last_login_time, last_login_ip, login_count, province, city, district, sex, email, mobile, address, delete_flag
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_user SET add_time = #{addTime}, add_user_id = #{addUserId}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, user_type = #{userType}, status = #{status}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, nick_name = #{nickName}, avator = #{avator}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp}, login_count = #{loginCount}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, sex = #{sex}, email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, address = #{address}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE admin_user
add_time=#{addTime},
add_user_id=#{addUserId},
update_time=#{updateTime},
update_user_id=#{updateUserId},
user_type=#{userType},
status=#{status},
user_name=#{userName},
password=#{password},
salt=#{salt},
nick_name=#{nickName},
avator=#{avator},
last_login_time=#{lastLoginTime},
last_login_ip=#{lastLoginIp},
login_count=#{loginCount},
province=#{province},
city=#{city},
district=#{district},
sex=#{sex},
email=#{email},
mobile=#{mobile},
address=#{address},
delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}
WHERE id = #{id}
